title: Latest News - Research and Scholarship - College of Arts and Sciences
cleaned_text: Prestigious Fulbright Awards This year, five Drexel students and recent alumni have been selected for the Fulbright U.S. Student Program, including two from the College of Arts and Sciences: Daouda Njie, BS environmental science '22, who was awarded a study/research grant to Fiji, and Neha Chongtham, biological sciences '23, who will serve as an English teaching assistant
